title: PBE hates me
body:
I was approved to be a PBE tester, but when I try to make the account, it just takes me to the application recieved page, and doesn't allow me to create a PBE account. this is a problem. is there some way to fix this or is rito just trolling me?
{{item:3070}} {{item:3151}}

replies.body: Lucky, I've applied for almost a year and still haven't gotten in

Hey Helios Ex, 

There was a bug with the PBE sign up last night. The issue should be resolved. Go ahead and try to create your account. If you're still having issues, please let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=jpAoPBWb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-30T16:53:03.513+0000)
>
> Hey Helios Ex,

> There was a bug with the PBE sign up last night. The issue should be resolved. Go ahead and try to create your account. If you're still having issues, please let me know!

it works now, thanks. :D
This problem happened to me too. There's another thread about this too, hope it gets fixed.
I've been signing up for 2 years now. I don't think I'll ever get a pbe account.

Hey, at least you *got* in. I've been applied since before the last wave of invites, and I still don't have anything to show for it

EDIT: I got in, yay! And I also have the same problem as you; the PBE site still says "application received" :(
